about_the_game:
Medieval Sandbox RPG: Weave Your Destiny

Game Overview

In a vast, medieval-inspired world, you begin your journey as a nameless individual, ready to weave your own story.

Freedom of Choice: Trade, plunder, serve… any path is yours to choose. Become a noble lord, usurp the throne, it's all up to you.

Complex Relationships: NPCs have their own desires and ambitions, acting according to their motivations. Your choices will change the world and history itself.

Dilemma-Driven Decisions: War or peace, wealth or morality. The difficult choices you make will forge your unique narrative.

Key Features

  • Expansive Open World: A beautiful world rendered in UE5. Explore castles, cities, villages, and diverse landscapes.

  • Free Roleplaying: From an unknown individual to a hero, ruler, or villain - become who you want to be.

  • Massive Real-Time Battles: Experience intense combat with hundreds of soldiers clashing. Employ strategy to claim victory.

  • Procedural Storytelling: Your actions change your relationships with NPCs, creating a unique and emergent story.

  • A World of Dilemmas: Conquest is not the only goal. Struggle with the choices between war and peace, and influence the course of history.

What Story Will You Weave?

short_description: A Strategy RPG where you live freely in a vast medieval feudal-simulated sandbox. Listen to the requests of the citizens, trade, plunder, serve, own a territory as a noble, usurp the throne, endless wars, and betrayal. The intertwining of your and numerous NPCs' intentions creates unique stories.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
